parsetree.*:
<root><template><title>Command

</title><part><name>game1</name>=<value>  arma3

</value></part><part><name>version1</name>=<value> 1.00

</value></part><part><name>gr1</name>=<value> GUI Control - Tree View

</value></part><part><name>descr</name>=<value>  Returns the right picture of a [[CT_TREE]] on given path.

</value></part><part><name>s1</name>=<value> [[tvPictureRight]] [idc, path]

</value></part><part><name>p1</name>=<value> idc: [[Number]]

</value></part><part><name>p2</name>=<value> path: [[Array]] - Path

</value></part><part><name>r1</name>=<value> [[String]] - Path to picture

</value></part><part><name>s2</name>=<value> ctrl [[tvPictureRight]] path

</value></part><part><name>p21</name>=<value> ctrl: [[Control]]

</value></part><part><name>p22</name>=<value> path: [[Array]] - Path

</value></part><part><name>r2</name>=<value> [[String]] - Path to picture

</value></part><part><name>x1</name>=<value> <code>_path= _controlTV [[tvPictureRight]] [0, 0];</code>

</value></part><part><name>seealso</name>=<value> [[tvSetPictureRight]] [[tvSetPicture]] [[tvPicture]]

</value></part></template></root>
